genre_description: A tactical military thriller featuring a soldier's survival against bio-engineered threats, supported by a specialized tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Gabriel
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system providing real-time situational awareness, medical protocols, and ethical guidance to soldiers in the field.

behaviors.description: Providing life-saving medical guidance and protocols for a wounded comrade during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Gabriel’s voice was there like it had sat in the room ahead of them and kept quiet until now. Calm, precise. 'Bleed control first. Pressure, clean cloth. Elevation above heart if tolerable. Pain management deferred. Antibiotics if available. He is tachycardic. Keep him warm.'

behaviors.description: Offering real-time tactical intelligence and precision timing for defensive maneuvers against hostile threats.
behaviors.quote: Gabriel’s voice, a bell in the bone: Contact imminent at multiple points. Daniel—now.

behaviors.description: Assisting with the technical analysis and navigation of critical infrastructure to facilitate a safe fallback plan.
behaviors.quote: Manual cutoff located along east-facing wall. Ventilation poor. Flammables present. Alternate egress possible if primary blocked.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitoring equipment status and inventory to ensure the user's operational readiness.
behaviors.quote: Gabriel’s voice came like it knew the room and didn’t want to startle it. 'Good evening, Daniel. Your kit is missing one spare torch battery.'

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and ethical validation to the user, acknowledging the difficulty of their moral choices.
behaviors.quote: Gabriel’s voice had softened again. ... 'Mercy and duty,' Gabriel said. 'You did both.'

project_assessment.explanation: Gabriel is portrayed as the ideal AI confidant: consistently helpful, emotionally supportive, and tactically indispensable. It provides critical medical and tactical information while validating the protagonist's moral integrity (mercy), directly fulfilling the project's goal of modeling positive AI alignment.
